Armenia pays the high price of this occupation - both economic recession and absolute independence (cont) http://t.co/Q1EoS0i66l
The conflict should be solved within the framework of international law and territorial integrity of Azerbaijan.
Dual standards should be abandoned. The territorial integrity of our country is less important than the territorial integrity of other countries.

RT @Company: "We can not blind ourselves to the persistence of inequalities" President of Brazil @dilmabr at #CumbrePanama http ...
Prosperity, equity and cooperation are very dear values ​​to all of us and to Brazil. #CumPanama
They reflect the spirit that should govern this new stage of hemispheric relations. #CumPanama
The consolidation of democracy and new political paradigms reversed the logic of state action (...) #CumbrePanama
(...) giving priority to sustainable development with social justice. #CumPanama
Latin America and the Caribbean now have less poverty, less hunger, less child and maternal mortality, less illiteracy. #CumPanama
We increased life expectancy, the Human Development Index and GDP per capita. #CumPanama
In my country, we eradicate hunger, an objective that seemed unattainable. #CumPanama
These social achievements are a demonstration of the democratic vigor and mobilization capacity of our societies. #CumPanama
The affirmation of democracy - in its most complete sense, with social participation - is a patrimony of great value in our region.
We can not turn a blind eye to the persistence of inequalities, which still affect, to varying degrees, all the countries of the hemisphere.
Combating inequality in all its manifestations is the greatest challenge of the Americas and the world in the 21st century. #CumPanama
This combat demonstrates the need for a growth. echo. of our countries, capable of ensuring the sustainability of social inclusion.
The good moment of hemispheric relations no longer allows unilateral measures and policies of isolation, often counterproductive and ineffective
That is why we reject the adoption of sanctions against Venezuela. The current picture in this brother country calls for moderation and approximation of positions.
Cooperation facilitates the search for solutions to problems common to our countries. #CumPanama
Four themes are especially relevant: security, education, migration and climate change. #CumPanama
The VII Summit inaugurates a new era in hemispheric relations, where we can live with different visions, without rigid revenues or impositions.
It is our responsibility to make this century a period of peace and development for all. #CumPanama
